text: Digaula ne ulu gi lodo di hale o God, gaa gai nia palaawaa dabu ala ne hagadabu ang gi God, i di madagoaa tagi aamua hai mee dabu go Abiathar. Tadau haganoho le e hai bolo go digau hai mee dabu hua ala e mee di gai nia palaawaa aalaa, gei David guu gai nia maa, guu wanga labelaa gi ono ehoo gi geina.”2.26 Leviticus 24.9
